## Plotting

Here is a plot below of the diamonds package:

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
df <- ggplot2::diamonds
ggplot(df) +
  geom_point(aes(x = x, y = carat)) + 
  geom_point(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point(aes(x = x, y = z)) +
  geom_point(aes(x = x, y = depth)) +
  geom_point(aes(x = x, y = table)) +
  geom_point(aes(x = x, y = price))
```
